backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no backend logic or persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing a feature request, affected frontend files, and related components with high‑confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions with OKLCH variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps ValentinePage in a ThemeProvider with light theme enforced.
Component rendering animated floating images with sway and blossom effects, plus load‑error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with heart icon and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/SparkleBurst.tsx: Creates an 8‑image radial sparkle animation originating from a click position.
frontend/src/components/SuccessModal.tsx: Success dialog showing a tulip message and animated falling white‑floral confetti.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with Valentine‑themed color tokens and utility classes plus custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: React page that renders a Valentine-themed interactive screen with animations, background preload, music toggle, and Yes/No button logic triggering messages and effects.
frontend/src/utils/assetDiagnostics.ts: Utility that preloads and verifies critical image assets, logging successes and failures for deployment diagnostics.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the interactive roses-boring flow.
